title: Google is pulling the plug on Assistant Snapshot, the only trace left of Google Now
content:
Google Snapshot is a useful tool that lives within Assistant and acts as a hub for predictive information — in essence, it’s a limited version of Google Now. Unfortunately, Google is killing off Snapshot, with a message now appearing to users saying that the feature is “going away soon.”

more…

The post Google is pulling the plug on Assistant Snapshot, the only trace left of Google Now appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google Assistant on Android has a useful feature that rounds up your information in one place called Snapshot, but the feature is going away.
